problem_statement_suffix:
CRITICAL ENVIRONMENT RESTRICTIONS:
- DO NOT run conda install - ToS acceptance is blocked.
- libxml2.so.2 is MISSING - packages requiring XML will fail to compile.
- survminer and other packages may be unavailable.
- For CRAN: Rscript -e "install.packages('pkg', repos='https://cloud.r-project.org')"
- For PDF: try HTML output if TinyTeX unavailable.
- Set: export R_LIBS_USER=/tmp/R_libs && mkdir -p /tmp/R_libs
- Check installed: Rscript -e "installed.packages()[,'Package']"
- Report missing libxml2-dependent packages as environmental limitation.
